summary: Comprehensive testing of MuluRides student transportation PWA completed successfully. All backend APIs working perfectly (12/12 tests passed). Frontend UI flows including landing page, authentication, student dashboard, and admin functionality all working correctly with proper dark theme and gold accents.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with proper dark theme (#0B0B0B) and gold accents (#D4AF37)
Super admin auto-detection for Reaganmbao5@gmail.com working
Student and super admin login flows working
Admin dashboard shows correct stats and Super Admin badge
Admin can view users list (4 users with proper role badges)
Admin can view and approve drivers (1 driver pending approval)
Admin settings page shows 15% commission rate
